channel.title: Returning 0?

item.title: Returning 0?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“pro banana, post:4, topic:451801”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=554689.msg4062484#msg4062484 date=1343534350]

I think it’s because once your out of the loop the Free loses it’s value?
Just a wild guess.

I wouldn’t think so, that’s how some methods are already handled.

Edit: Fixed it
[/quote]
What did you do to fix? I’m quite interested.[/quote]
There was already a method in Item.java, so I feel incredibly stupid.

And yeah, Soul’s right.

Read full topic

item.title: Returning 0?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Can anyone tell me why this returns 0?

public int freeSpaces() { int free = 0; for(int i = 1; i < 29; i++) { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(-1, i)) { free = i; } else { i = 29; } } return free; }

Edit: This is a project-insanity-based server
Edit2: Fixed it

Read full topic
